zh: 新增 Windows 桌面客户端与安装包构建能力。
新增模板变量、多地图定位、快捷搜索、Ob 同步与 WebDAV 备份增强。
修复首页/编辑器/统计交互与 AI 总结按钮渲染溢出，并提升桌面端唤醒与设置响应速度。
en: Added Windows desktop client support with installer build pipeline.
Added template variables, multi-map location, quick search, Ob sync, and enhanced WebDAV backup flows.
Fixed interaction issues on Home/Editor/Stats and AI summary button overflow, while improving desktop wake-up and settings responsiveness.

zh: 模板变量与多地图定位
服务器模式下的 WebDAV 备份
回收站与笔记历史版本
Debug 模式增加截图功能
增加 Windows 端部署资源
en: Added template variables and multi-map location support.
Added WebDAV backup in server mode.
Added recycle bin and memo history versions.
Added screenshot capture in debug mode.

zh: 预热并复用桌面子窗口，提升设置与快速输入唤醒速度
日志收集并增强位置隐私脱敏
en: Warmed and reused desktop child windows to speed up settings and quick-input wake-up.
Enhanced log collection with location privacy masking.

zh: 修复首页/编辑器/统计等页面交互问题
修复 AI 总结按钮组件渲染溢出
en: Fixed interaction issues on Home/Editor/Stats pages.
Fixed overflow in the AI summary button component.
